description:
He is Tsukune Aono`s father, Kasumi Aono`s husband, and Kyouko Aono`s uncle.
In the last chapters of the first year of the manga, Tsukune`s father makes a very brief appearance, only appearing in the first Volume as to explain to Tsukune how he found the entrance form to Yokai Academy.
(Source:MAL)
name: Aono Kouji
